__e: And that was a big payday for us, and I think that speaks to how much we believe in you guys.
We believe in love, you know, in just whatever form it might take.
We're here because we believe in you and in what you're doing.
Yes, and we've made it clear that we're not buying it.
They need us, even if it's just to give them a reason to go on, even if we don't believe it ourselves.
How do you answer the person who asks, "why do you want to kill us just because we do not believe as you believe?"
Because at Vesta Rose... We believe... People are more than just their jobs!
Because we believe people have the right to choose their final resting place.
Yes, we believe that anybody who dies here goes to the volcano, and that volcano has become their village, where you can talk to them and they can talk to us.
Yes. We believe that you're involved in it.
We'd like to make sure we obtain this item before he does.
You guys are in real trouble if you did what we think you did.
And we think that there may be someone lost on the streets. Someone who thinks that he's still at war.
Look, we believe that this school has something which is of the utmost important to our people.
One cannot put a price on the safety of a child, Your Honor, and we believe that Jack Porter is a flight risk.
As for what this enemy knows about us, so far, we believe nothing.
Well, we believe that he means the government loves you. And it wants to forgive you if you just let the government into your heart.
Number two, we believe that it can only be in one place at a time.
